titleStmt.title: The Humble remonstrance and complaint of many thousands of poore distressed prisoners in the prisons in and about the citie of London committed for debt and other uncapitall offences wherein is plainly declared the insufferable abuses both in fees and other exactions inflicted on poore prisoners by jaylors and such other instruments of law though not of justice : presented to the consideration of the high court of Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
